name: Basketball - World Cup 2014 Edition
description:
Enjoy the experience of Basketball World Cup 2014. It is best basketball game available on store developed in real 3D graphics. Basketball - World Cup 2014 Edition is an addictive game developed for the basketball fans. You can improve your basketball game skill by playing game in quick play mode and then play in real environment. You can experience live basketball game with realistic 3D graphics.

Features:
- Realistic 3D Graphics
- Quick Play and Tournament
- 11 Basketball Teams
- Easy Controls
- Realistic Sound Effects

Teams:
-United States of America
-Spain
-Argentina
-Turkey
-France
-Australia
-Brazil
-Egypt
-Mexico
-Iran
-South Korea
